abilities.primary: Shatter Shields — crystalline barriers that fracture into offensive shards on break (shard burst + stagger).
abilities.secondary: The Stick — modular weapon firing kinetic, prismatic, or rupture energy depending on focus.
abilities.tertiary: Prisema Resonance — converts light into condensed bursts; toggles between healing pulses and destructive beams.
abilities.symbolic: Big Sister’s Fury — protects the vulnerable; strikes decisively when cornered.

resonance.with_avita: Amda anchors Avita’s radiance with shields; channels spillover light through the Stick into actionable firepower.
resonance.with_becca: Big-sister mentor—teaches survival without losing humanity.

arc.origin: An orphan who took up care and arms in equal measure.
arc.struggle: Her fury risks overtaking her role as protector.
arc.potential: Fuses shield, weapon, and healing into a single art of salvation.
